title: What's the full story of Lance Stroll's Spanish GP absence? What you missed in Barcelona
summary: The mysteries of the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix paddock: Why wasn't Christian Horner out defending his star driver? When will F1 talk to IndyCar? And what did happen to Lance Stroll?

qa_pairs.question: Which team does Lance Stroll drive for in Formula 1?
What is the role of Christian Horner in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Team Principal of Red Bull Racing
